measured_by: Multiple Price List (MPL) task (including MPL, MPL-Cont, MPL-Video, MPL-Choice, MPL-Gift variants)
justification: "Participants always completed the tasks in the same order. They first answered the Multiple Price List (MPL) task of Prissé (2022) to measure time preferences."

measured_by: Holt and Laury (2002) lottery task / Gumball machine risk task
justification: "Then participants answered the risk preferences task of Holt and Laury (2002)." and "Due to the poor performance... we introduced a visual support using a gumball machine to help subjects understand the concept of probabilities."

measured_by: Cognitive Reflection Test (CRT) adapted for teenagers
justification: "Subjects then completed the Cognitive Reflection Test (CRT) of Thomson and Oppenheimer (2016) to measure cognitive abilities."
"…and a financial abilities (Fin) test adapted to teenagers."
"Additionally, participants also answered in the third wave the Delavande test (DL) of Estepa et al. (2021)… to measure teenagers' ability to understand probabilities."
